value:
I'm loving this weather! I know this
probably isn't the time for it, but I
want to splash around in a spring.

We're supposed to be enjoying the
summer, but my brother is so moody.$k$pHe's always brooding! I wish he'd just
let himself have fun once in a while.

You're not pushing yourself too hard,
are you? I'd hate to see you get
heatstroke.$k$pWhy don't we go relax in the shade?
That should cool you down.

I really like this swimsuit. There's
nothing formal about it. It's really
liberating!

I put my hair up so it doesn't get in
the way when I'm swimming. I'll help
you with your hair if you like.

How nice to meet you! I'm Tana, from
Frelia. If you're looking for swim gear,
ask $Nf!

It's thanks to my swimsuit. I'm
sure of it!
There we go!
Oh, no! My strap got tangled...

Thanks. It feels like the summer
sun is shining down on me.

Nice to meet you. I'm Tana! The
ocean is so inviting this summer—are
you ready to dive in?

Just look at that sunset. Gorgeous! A
beautiful end to another perfect day. It
makes me a bit sad...$k$pI'm having so much fun here with
everyone that the sunsets are making
me a little melancholy.$k$pRight now, I feel like I'm living in a
dream...$k$pMy days are filled with joy and
kindness, spent with my brother and
my friends.$k$pWe all fought so hard for this peace—
Innes, Eirika, Ephraim, and so many
others. I treasure each moment.$k$pDon't tell Innes about this
conversation. He'd laugh at my
naiveté... This is our little secret, OK?$k$pNow... What do you feel like doing
tomorrow? The day is wide open!
やぁっ！
それっ！
だめぇっ！
水着が…！
Not too hot!
Feel the summer sun!
Fighting in style!
I am a swimmer of Frelia!
Where's the changing room?
Umm...
Want to go swimming? Let's go!
Hey! Cut it out! What's gotten into you?
Don't forget to stretch before you go swimming. It's important!
Oh, yes. I have gone swimming before. I've been to the sea back at home.
Just floating in the sea...feels so good.
It's so silly of Eirika—she was too embarrassed to come along with us. There's absolutely no need to feel that way!
Don't worry about drowning. I'll do my very best to save you!
Sure!
Working up a sweat!
Let's swim!
